name: Dormancy
description:
Originally begun as a city builder where you start as one skeleton and get more skeletons to gather various resources like wood and stone. As the town begins to grow, the skeletons would begin to become more human, and require more resources such as food. Unfortunately we did not get there, BUT you can click on the ball and skeleton to move them.

CONTROLS: WASD to move camera

Middle Click and Hold to rotate camera

Scroll wheel to zoom in and out

Left Click to Select

Right Click to move the selected unit to the location

1 to place a building

Made in Unity
